summary: Build an AI Content Idea Generator for creators focused on trending content, including reel idea generation, hooks/captions, content planning, trend detection, scripting/editing suggestions, and monetization features—now also including non-Stripe monetization options like ad-based unlocks and affiliate links.

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity-based creator workspace with per-user saved items (ideas, hooks, captions, scripts, calendar entries, and saved trends) persisted in the Motoko canister and scoped to the authenticated principal.

Add an Instagram Reel Ideas generator UI where users specify niche/topic, target audience, content style (educational/entertainment/storytime/etc.), desired length, and call-to-action; generate a set of reel ideas with structured fields (title, premise, key beats, suggested b-roll, on-screen text, CTA).

Add a Hook generator that produces multiple hook options tailored to the selected niche and tone, with categories (curiosity, contrarian, authority, story, quick-win) and length variants (short/medium/long).

Add a Viral Caption generator that produces multiple caption options based on an input idea/hook, with optional keywords, emoji density selection, and hashtag generation; include variants for different intents (value, storytelling, CTA-heavy).

Implement an AI script + editing suggestions generator that outputs a reel script in sections (hook, setup, payoff, CTA) plus a separate list of editing suggestions (cuts, pacing, captions style, b-roll, sound/music cues).
Add a Content Calendar feature that lets users schedule saved ideas/scripts onto dates, view by month/week, and track basic status (planned, drafted, posted) with notes.

Add a Trending Topic detector feature that allows users to build a trend watchlist by entering keywords/topics and then generates a ranked list of “trend candidates” using on-app scoring (recency input, relevance to niche, novelty) and highlights why each trend is suggested.

Create a cohesive, modern visual theme for a creator-focused “trending” tool (distinct color palette, typography scale, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across all pages and components.
Add a simple onboarding screen that introduces the app and guides first-time users to the main tools.
Show the onboarding screen only for first-time users after they are authenticated and have completed profile setup; do not show it again once dismissed/completed.
Wire onboarding navigation into the existing TanStack Router flow so the user can proceed to core app areas (at minimum, Generators).
Add a new authenticated Settings page at route "/settings" (protected by the existing AuthGuard) and ensure it is reachable via the app navigation.

On the Settings page, provide an editable Profile section that loads the current user profile (via existing queries) and allows updating and saving profile fields using the existing saveCallerUserProfile mutation.

On the Settings page, provide an Onboarding section with a "Reset onboarding" control that clears the onboarding completion state using the existing onboardingStorage helper so the onboarding screen can be shown again.
On the Settings page, provide an Appearance section that allows the user to switch theme (light/dark/system) using the existing next-themes ThemeProvider setup.

Add a new authenticated Monetization section that explains concrete ways a creator can earn money using the app’s outputs (e.g., affiliate offers, productized services, brand deals, digital products) and provides actionable next steps inside the app.

Add a Monetization Offer Generator tool that helps users define and save monetizable offers (e.g., “1:1 coaching package”, “UGC bundle”, “affiliate product review series”) with structured fields (title, target customer, problem solved, deliverables, price range, CTA, fulfillment notes).

Add a Brand Pitch Builder tool that generates and saves outreach assets: a short pitch DM, a longer email pitch, and 3 follow-up messages, using the user’s profile (niche/target audience/goals) when available plus user-entered brand name/product, collaboration type, and desired outcome.

Add a Media Kit generator that helps users create a simple one-page media kit from their profile and manual inputs (handles, content niches, audience description, content pillars, sample deliverables, contact email), and save the media kit data for reuse.

Add a Revenue Goals & Tracker feature that lets users set monthly income goals and track simple revenue entries (date, source type like affiliate/brand/service/product, amount, notes), persisted per user.
Add React Query hooks for the new Monetization backend methods and integrate them into the new Monetization UI so data loads, saves, and invalidates correctly.
Add navigation entry points so authenticated users can discover Monetization from the main app layout and (optionally) from the landing page messaging without breaking existing routes.

Implement a "view-ads-to-unlock" system that lets an authenticated user unlock premium/advanced outputs by completing an in-app ad-watching flow (no third-party ad network required). The system must track a per-user unlock balance (credits) that persists across sessions.

Add premium gating that uses the ad-unlock credits: when the user attempts to access an advanced/premium action, the app must either (a) allow it if the user has sufficient unlock credits or (b) prompt the user to watch an ad to earn credits and then retry the action after credits are granted.

Add affiliate link placements inside the authenticated Monetization section: provide a dedicated area that lists recommended tools/resources with outbound affiliate links and an affiliate disclosure. The list must be easy to scan and each item must support opening the link in a new tab.

new_feature_requests.summary: Content calendar for planning and scheduling ideas
AI script generator with editing suggestions
Add a simple onboarding screen for first-time users
Add subscription/paywall monetization (free tier + paid plans) to unlock premium generators and saved items
Add payments + billing management (checkout, plan upgrades/downgrades, cancellation, invoices)
Add usage limits/credits system for AI generations with paid top-ups
Add referral/affiliate program to drive growth and revenue
Extend the backend actor (single-actor architecture) with per-user storage and query/mutation methods for Monetization Offers, Brand Pitches, Media Kits, and Revenue tracking data.
Add a view-ads-to-unlock model that lets users unlock advanced/premium outputs by watching ads instead of paying a subscription
Add affiliate link placements inside the Monetization section so the app can earn commissions from product/tool referrals
